title: Self-Assessment Report
reportInstructions: You must answer the following sections for each requirement, attaching the necessary evidence and proof, explaining their availability and the program's achievement of them, clarifying strengths and weaknesses and methods for improvement, in the designated space. The existence of appropriate and activated mechanisms for continuous improvement and development of the teaching process.
